Posts.Content: Apr 22, 2011 04:12PM MonoVersesStereo wrote: 25.  They wanted me to wait until 5 years prior to my mother's diagnosis, which would have put me at 38.  At 25 I was stage 2 with a 2.5 cm tumor and just found that the cancer has spread to my liver --- i would have been dead by 38.
